summary:

- **Top 20 Holdings:** Represent **68.2%** of portfolio; largest exposures: CSL (7.4%), Macquarie Group (6.0%), Goodman Group (4.8%).  
- **Sector Allocation:** Healthcare (15.8%), IT (15.3%), Industrials (13.7%) dominate.  
- **Performance vs Benchmark (1-year):**

*No material trading or capital markets impacts identified (routine monthly update).*
